data.description: The Authorization Framework for Network APIs enables a Resource Owner owning network resources exposed by Network APIs and RESTful APIs in particular, to authorize third-party Applications (desktop, mobile and web Applications)to access these resources via that API on the Resource Owner’s behalf.

The scope of this document is limited to the Enabler Release Definition of Authorization Framework for Network APIs (Autho4API) version 1.0 according to OMA Release process and the Enabler Release specification baseline listed in section 5.

The Authorization Framework for Network APIs will enable a resource owner owning network resources exposed by the Network APIs and RESTful APIs, to authorize third-party applications (desktop, mobile and web applications)  to access these resources via that API on the resource owner’s behalf.
